rows.label: qst702402_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, look! Is scary lady from before.

rows.label: qst702402_msg0002
rows.name:
Truth, truth! Just remembering
now, Yokuyoku spring little
leak in pants area...

rows.label: qst702402_msg0003
rows.name: Just Laura will do, thank you..

rows.label: qst702402_msg0004
rows.name:
Tell me, friends... Since the
last time we met, have you
thought of what you want to do?

rows.label: qst702402_msg0005
rows.name:
What want to do...? Like,
new pranks to pull?

rows.label: qst702402_msg0006
rows.name:
Yeah, we think if there any
good way to achieve complete
dominion over townspeople!

rows.label: qst702402_msg0007
rows.name: Buncha troublemakers, aren't they?

rows.label: qst702402_msg0008
rows.name:
Still though, they sound quite gutsy...
Say, boys, how would you like to use
those guts in service to the militia?

rows.label: qst702402_msg0009
rows.name: Mill-lish-ah? Wossat? Is tasty?

rows.label: qst702402_msg0010
rows.name:
Uh, how should I explain this...?
The militia is sort of like a bunch
of people who love justice.

rows.label: qst702402_msg0011
rows.name: Jus...tice?

rows.label: qst702402_msg0012
rows.name:
Indeed, justice! They are men and
women of the highest caliber, all
mighty and elegant warriors!

rows.label: qst702402_msg0013
rows.name: Mighty...? Elegant...?!

rows.label: qst702402_msg0014
rows.name:
And right now, the militia could use
brave and capable people like you boys
to serve as squires and the like.

rows.label: qst702402_msg0015
rows.name:
Big brotherpon, what do? If ask
me, whole thing smell fishy.

rows.label: qst702402_msg0016
rows.name:
Exactly! Would have to be
real mush-for-brain of a pon
to believe such nonsense!

rows.label: qst702402_msg0017
rows.name: Mo-mo...

rows.label: qst702402_msg0018
rows.name:
Big bropon, please don't tell
you actually considering...?

rows.label: qst702402_msg0019
rows.name: Hm... Ryuuryuu think is super idea!

rows.label: qst702402_msg0020
rows.name:
Mo-mo?! Seems is always
one in every family...

rows.label: qst702402_msg0021
rows.name:
What ho! You've decided
to sign up, then?

rows.label: qst702402_msg0022
rows.name:
No, no way! That was low-down
mean cheap trick! Not count!

rows.label: qst702402_msg0023
rows.name:
Big bropon easy to rope in with
big words like "elegant" or
"mighty"! Is too easy to exploit!

rows.label: qst702402_msg0024
rows.name:
Now we know story, mo!
Is enough for today!

rows.label: qst702402_msg0025
rows.name:
Of course, you should discuss this
carefully amongst yourselves.

rows.label: qst702402_msg0026
rows.name:
And if you decide to do the
right thing, just come to
the militia camp any time!

rows.label: qst702402_msg0027
rows.name: You know we'll be waiting!
